get.desc: Lists the reservations summaries for daily or monthly grain.

params.name: scope
params.desc: The scope of the reservation summaries. The scope can be 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}' or 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}/reservations/{ReservationId}'

params.name: $filter
params.desc: Required only for daily grain. The properties/UsageDate for start date and end date. The filter supports 'le' and  'ge'

default.desc: Error response describing why the operation failed.
